name: Too Late, Too Bitter
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 33 compo – Theme: "You are the monster"

Please note this is a post-compo version! You can rate the original here.

Current version: 0.2

  • 0.1: compo version
  • 0.2: Improved UI and UX

I consider development mostly done now. Some people have requested sound effects or other improvements, but I don't have the time to put them in place right now, and would rather move on to exploring other game ideas. If there is any value in this, it is there already.
